name: Nicole F
text: Love my Jack O Lantern pizza.  And the s'mores bar was delicious. Thanks guys for the amazing pizza

name: Michelle S.
text: I absolutely love this place, this location in particular also. The pizzas are always so good. My favorite is the bacon artichoke but also love me a stuffed pizza from time to time. Those things are worth every penny! But the staff are …More

name: Jade Arroyo
text: You can never go wrong with Papa Murphy’s. Their gourmet veggie is the best. I LOVE THE WHITE GARLIC SAUCE! The large never seems large enough but that’s a me issue. …More

name: Alesha Jacobsen
text: So impressed with how friendly and quick the staff was at this location, and that my toppings weren’t haphazardly thrown on but perfectly covering the pizza; I can’t say the same for other locations I’ve gone to in the past. …More

name: Emma R
text: We love Papa Murphy’s! George, the owner takes such pride in the pizzas he makes. Customer service is top notch. We don’t live in the immediate area anymore but whenever we know we’ll be on that side of town and plan to get pizza, we make sure to pick one up from George.

name: Ashleigh Foltz
text: Check out this monster pizza behind me. This is the 5-meat Stuffed pizza with added feta and it was amazing!! I had never been to Papa Murphy's before but I had an absolute blast watching them make the pizza, baking the pizza at home and …More

name: Heather Walker
text: This place was great!  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  This was our first time in, so they gave us perfect instructions on how to bake the pizza to perfection!  My kiddo LOOVED the crust! We baked it just a bit longer to get the crust nice and crispy. Super yummy! We will definitely be back!

name: Taylor P
text: I love this location! It is always fast while still maintaining great quality pizza. I’ve been to other Phoenix and Scottsdale locations but they just throw the toppings on and send you out the door. The 64th and Greenway location puts it …More

name: Liz Cameron
text: Got a Papa's favorite pan pizza. Was disappointed to see that they did away with their alternate pizza sauce as I thought the other sauce was always better than the original.  I will note though that I have taken their pizzas home to freeze …More

name: April Tatum
text: I had been looking forward to trying this place. The pizza was really good, I followed the instructions and it came out perfect. Not sure of the gentleman who helped me at the store, but he gave great customer service.

name: Lindsay Flowers
text: This was my first time getting a Papa Murphy’s pizza, and it was so convenient! It didn’t look like it was going to be that good before I baked it, but it looked delicious afterwards... and it was delicious!! They even have a gluten-free option!

name: Kaley Euson
text: I love this location! The staff goes above and beyond to be super friendly and helpful. The pizza is always delicious and it’s quick to get in and out.

name: Katie Whitchurch
text: Amazing pizza! So easy to order, even easier to pickup and it tastes amazing. Everyone inside was helpful and professional and I will definitely order from this location again!

name: Rachel Terrey
text: Just tried this the other night and it did not disappoint. We got the stuffed and its not only beautiful to look at but delicious. I'm so excited to eat the leftovers.

name: Elizabeth Krohn
text: Pan pizza had a very doughy taste to it. Thin crust wasn't worth the money bc it was the thinnest crust I've ever seen. It's not a bad concept, but you're better off making your own at home.

name: Amanda Powell
text: First time trying Papa Murphys, so good! Especially loved that we got to decide how crispy the crust turned out.

name: Randy Englund
text: My wife and I always pass by this place and never had the chance to get pizza there.  We finally went today and we made the pizzas.  By far the best pizza I have ever had and we will be back tomorrow to get more.

name: Amanda Brimlow
text: Quick, delicious and convenient! We had the Chicago stuffed pizza and it was so good!

name: James Nayhouse
text: Love the 5 meat stuffed pizza. $10 Tuesdays are a great deal for any large. For $2 extra you can get a family size. Such a deal and delicious. Add a salad for a great meal.

name: Jacob Miller
text: Ive worked at a papa murphys and just a warning. If any of these people working here tell you all of the produce and meat are fresh, its because they are told to say that. Only the tomatoes and and onions are fresh. Olives come in can, all the meat is packaged, even the sauce is packaged. Just be aware of it if you want to eat here

name: Andrew Jenkins
text: Great pizza and lots of special offers. Best take and bake pizza around.

name: Harry Walmsley
text: George and his crew give excellent service with a great attitude and a delicious pizza. I highly recommend.

name: Mark Tiras
text: GREAT PIZZA. You take it home & cook it.. They always have coupons too...

name: Not You
text:
Best pizza money can buy

Seriously

name: mike morton
text: Consistently Excellent! Cooks perfectly every time and a great value. Thin Crust is delicious!

name: Jaime Thompson
text: Always friendly. Truly great customer service.

name: Debbie Goulet
text: Papa Murphys was very clean.  The associate working the counter was very courteous, kind, helpful. Great place,

name: Kevin Albert
text: Favorite "fast food" place. Quick in and out, and somewhat healthy pizza too!

name: Chris Hess
text: Very easy and quick to drop in and grab a few pizzas.  This wouldn't be the best choice for calorie conscious shoppers, but if you need to feed a family this place will do the trick for a reasonable price.

name: kevin fiero
text: Convenient take home and cook dinner!!

name: Mark Tiras
text: Great Pizza. Cook it at home & serve hot.

name: Jack Hamlett
text: Best pizza there is. George the owner remembers your fav pizza every time

name: peggy zeffer
text: they're always the best

name: Mary Kay Asche
text: Always tastes great and the service is EXCELLENT!

name: Todd Myers
text: 1st time here, walked in, made order  & BAM  two minutes later were out the door with our 2 pizzas.  WOW !!!!

name: Vikas Khadgi
text: Timings are wrong.. this place closes by 8 PM

name: Phil4673 Alu
text: We ordwres family size thin crust /extra cheese....Worst pizza in a long time..tasteless ...... taste like those cheep frozen pizzas. ..which we don't eat.....never ever again....

name: Chris Schmid
text: Fast Service. Great Take and Bake Pizza.

name: Krystle Barton - Shumac
text: Always a good choice for a family night meal!

name: Al Redford
text: Always the best !

name: Deborah Hughes
text: Great service

name: Amanda Schmitt
text: Love this place

name: scott brown
text: Great pizza

name: Robert Stucker
text: Good pizza.

name: Markus Zimmer
text: Tried tin crust this time - it was good

name: Mathew Smith
text: Very Tasty Pizza

name: Rosalie Forsythe
text: Great pizza and service

name: Tom Murray
text: Great food and service.

name: Myrna Craig
text: Best pizza we've had for a long time - try the gourmet vegetarian - YUM!!!!!!!!!!!
